Rayon Sports vs Atlabara FC

Rayon Sports 2-0 Atlabara FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

21:33

Rayon Sports igeze muri ¼

Rayon Sports itsinze Atlabara FC yo muri Sudani y'Epfo ibitego 2-0, igira amanota atandatu mu mikino ibiri ndetse ihise igera muri 1/4.

Undi mukino wabaye muri iri tsinda rya mbere, warangiye TP Mazembe itsinze KMC yo muri Tanzanie igitego 1-0.

Iri tsinda rizagaruka mu kibuga ku wa Gatandatu, aho Rayon Sports izahura na KMC guhera saa 18:00, umukino uzaba wabanjirijwe n'uzahuza TP Mazembe na Atlabara FC saa 15:30.

Tubashimire mwese twabanye uyu munsi, tuzasubire ku wa Kane ku mukino uzahuza APR FC na Heegan FC mu itsinda C rikinira hano kuri Stade ya Kigali.

21:27

Umukino urarangiye

21:27

90+1' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Mugheni Kakule Fabrice ateye ishoti rikomeye ari muri metero nka 28, umunyezamu Khamis Daniel arirambuye akozaho ikiganza, ujya muri koruneri itewe na Rutanga, Elio Jido akiza izamu. Rayon Sports yokeje igitutu Atlabara FC.

21:25

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane, Mfaume Ally Nasor wo muri Zanzibar, yerekanye iminota itatu y'inyongera muri uyu mukino ukomeje kubera i Niyamirambo.

21:23

87' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Rayon Sports ibonye koruneri itewe na Bizimana Yannick, umupira ushyirwaho umutwe na Irakoze Saidi, ujya hejuru y'izamu. Rayon Sports ikomeje gusatira ishaka igitego cya gatatu.

21:21

85' Umusifuzi wo hagati asabye imbabazi uwo ku ruhande

N'ubwo bombi bambaye utwuma tubafasha kumvikana, umusifuzi wo ku ruhande, Sassy Ali, ntiyamenye ko umusifuzi wo ku ruhande rw'iburyo yamanitse, yerekana ko habayeho kurarira, umukino urakomeza. Uwo hagati ageze aho amubwira ko atari yabyumvise.

21:18

82' Gusimbuza

Peter Sunday avuyemo, hagiyemo Elio Jido Ronald. Iyi ni nayo mpinduka ya nyuma muri uyu mukino ku ruhande rw'iyi kipe yo muri Sudani y'Epfo.

21:15

79' Igitego cya kabiri cya Rayon Sports

Akinjira mu kibuga, Bizimana Yannick atanze umupira kuri Mugheni Fabrice uwuhinduye mu rubuga rw'amahina, usanga Ulimwengu awutera hejuru mu izamu, atsinda igitego cye cya kabiri muri uyu mukino, icya gatatu muri iri rushanwa.

21:13

78' Gusimbuza

Rayon Sports ikoze impinduka ya nyuma. Ciza Hussein asimbuwe na rutahizamu Bizimana Yannick ugiye gukina umukino we wa mbere muri Rayon Sports nyuma yo kugurwa muri AS Muhanga. Uyu musore ukiri muto yatsinze ibitego 15 muri shampiyona ishize.

21:11

76' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Peter Sunday akiniye nabi Ulimwengu Jules mu kibuga hagati, ikosa rihanwe na Imran Nshimiyimana atanga umupira kuri Mugeni ukinanannye na Nizeyimana Mirafa atakaza umupira, ariko Rayon Sports irawusubirana.

21:07

71' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Rutanga ateye umupira ahana ikosa rikozwe na Mandela Malish, usanga Rugwiro Herve ushyizeho umutwe, umupira ukurwamo n'umunyezamu Khamis Daniel ugarukira Mugheni uwishyizeho umutwe, abarimo Ulimwengu bakomeza bashaka uko bawugeza mu rubuga rw'amahina, ariko abakinnyi ba Atlabara FC birwanaho, bakiza izamu.

21:04

69' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Mugheni akinannye na Irakoze Saidi uhaye umupira Ulimwengu, na we awuhindura imbere y'izamu ashaka Ciza Hussein, awutangwa na myugariro wa Atlbara FC, Mustafa Salim uhise ukiza izamu.

21:01

66' Gusimbuza

Commodore Olokwei wakinnye neza na none nk'uko byagenze ku Cyumweru, avuye mu kibuga, aho yongeye gusimburwa na Nizeyimana Mirafa bakina ku mwanya umwe mu kibuga hagati, imbere ya ba myugariro.

20:58

61' Rayon Sports ihushije ubundi buryo

Iradukunda Eric ahinduye umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, usanga Mugheni Fabrice ushyizeho umutwe, uca hejuru gato y'izamu rya Atlabara FC. Rayon Sports yihariye umukino kuva utangiye kugeza magingo aya.

20:56

58' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Ciza Hussein ahaye umupira Irakoze Saidi uteye umupira ukomeye mu izamu, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Khamis Daniel uzamutse, awukoraho. Bwari uburyo bw'igitego.

20:55

56' Gusimbuza

Silvano Achiga yinjiye mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa Atlbara FC, asimbuye Obeyono Philip Edisiri utorohewe na ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports muri uyu mukino.

20:49

53' Gusimbuza

Tombe Jimmy yinjiye mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa Atlbara FC, asimbuye Mutawakil Abdelkarim wahawe ikarita y'umuhondo mu gice cya mbere.

20:43

48' Gusimbuza

Irakoze Saidi wavuye muri Musongati FC yo mu Burundi, yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Iranzi Jean Claude ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports.

20:40

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Rayon Sports yongeye gutangira iri hejuru.

20:36

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

20:27

45+3' Rayon Sports ihushije penalti

Iranzi Jean Claude ahushije penaliti ahawe nyuma y'ikosa Mustafa Salim yari amaze gukorera kuri Ciza Hussein mu rubuga rw'amahina. Igice cya mbere gihise kirangira, amakipe yombi ajya kuruhuka.

20:26

45+2' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Umutoza wa Atlbara FC, Morris Michael ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga ajya kuburana kuri penaliti ihawe Rayon Sports.

20:24

45' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Rutanga Eric ateye umupira ahana ikosa rikorewe kuri Mugheni Kakule Fabrice, uca hejuru, ku ruhande rw'izamu ririmo Khamis Daniel,


Hari gukinwa iminota ibiri y'inyongera.

20:22

43' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Peter Sunday wa Atlabara FC, ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Mugheni Fabrice inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina. Umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports aryamye hasi yitabwaho n'abaganga.

20:19

40' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Ulimwengu wari kumwe na Rutanga, akiniwe nabi na Mandela Malish, umusifuzi Sassy Ali atanga coup-franc itewe na Ciza Hussein umupira ukurwaho mu buryo bukomeye ndetse umunyezamu Khamis Daniel ugonganye na Rugwiro aguma aryamye hasi.

20:14

35' Koruneri ya Rayon Sports

Iradukunda Eric Radu ahawe umupira na Mugheni, awuhindura mu izamu, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Mutawakil Abdelkarim n'umutwe. Iranzi ateye uyu mupira abakinnyi ba Atlabara FC bawusubiza mu yindi koruneri itagize icyo itanga.

20:12

33' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Ciza Hussein atanze umupira kuri Mugheni Fabrice mu rubuga rw'amahina, na we awuhindura imbere y'izamu ashaka Ulimwengu ntiyawugeraho, usanga Rutanga Eric uteye ishoti rikomeye, risanga Ulimwengu yarayemo.

20:09

30' Koruneri ya Atlbara FC

Iragire Saidi atakaje umupira ufashwe na Nelson Mandela, awutanga kuri Yakub Adam n'agatsitsino, airko Ciza Hussein arahagobotse ashyira umupira muri koruneri.

20:06

28' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Ulimwengu Jules ahawe umupira, asigaranye n'umunyezamu Khamis Daniel, amutanga umupira awusbiza kuri bagenzi be bakina inyuma.

20:04

26' Koruneri ya Atlabara FC

Rutanga Eric arengeje umupira wari ufitwe na Nelson Mandela, ujya muri koruneri itewe na Buay Lam, ufatwa neza na Kimenyi Yves uzamutse mu kirere akabatanga umupira.

20:02

23' Coup-franc ya Atlabara

Rugwiro Herve akiniye nabi Nelson Mandela, bagenzi be bahannye iri kosa habura umuntu ukora kuri uyu mupira usubira kuri Iradukunda Eric ukiniwe nabi na Mandela Malish ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo.

19:58

20' Rayon Sports yihariye umupira

Abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports barahuza cyane muri uyu mukino ndetse barakina umupira wihuta, aho bimye umupira Atlabara FC. Nshimiyimana Amran, Iranzi Jean Claude, Mugheni na Commodore Olokwei bahagaze neza cyane muri iyi minota.

19:55

15' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Rayon Sports ifunguye amazamu ku gitego gitsinzwe na Ulimwengu Jules uhawe umupira mwiza na Iradukunda Eric Radu nyuma yo guherezwa na Iranzi na we wari uhawe na Nshimiyimana Imran.

19:52

12' Rayon Sports ihushije uburyo bwiza

Nshimiyimana Imran akinannye na Mugheni FABRICE na we atanga umupira kuri Jules Ulimwengu uteye ishoti rikomeye rica imbere, hirya gato y'izamu rya Atlbara FC ririmo Khamis Daniel.

19:49

10' Coup-franc ya Atlabara FC

Iragire Saidi akiniye nabi rutahizamu Jimmy Michael, umupira utewe na Yakub Adam ugarurwa n'urukuta mbere y'uko awusubizayo ugafatwa neza na Kimenyi Yves.

19:47

9' Ubundi buryo kuri Rayon Sports

Ahagararanye na Iranzi, Ciza Hussein ahannye ikosa ku mupira uteretse muri metero nka 25, uca hejuru y'izamu rya Atlbara FC iri kurangwa n'amakosa menshi.

19:46

7' Poto ya Rayon Sports

Iranzi Jean Claude ateye umupira ahana ikosa ryari rikozwe na myugariro wa Atlabara FC, utambuka ku bakinnyi bose ugera kuri Ulimwengu uwushyize mu izamu ugarurwa n'umutambiko. Bwari uburyo bwiza kuri Gikundiro iri gukinira imbere y'abafana bayo buzuye Stade ya Kigali.

19:44

4' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Ku ikosa rikozwe na Okena Pixy, Ciza Hussein ateye umupira w'umuterekano ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports, Imran Nshimiyimana ashyizeho umutwe akurwaho umupira na myugariro Yakub Adam.

19:42

2'Amakipe yombi atangiranye ishyaka

Abakinnyi ku mpande zombi batangiye bafite ishyaka ryo gusatirana mu buryo bukomeye, ariko umusifuzi wo ku ruhande avuze ko rutahizamu wa Atlabara FC yarayemo mu gihe na Rayon Sports ibonye koruneri itewe na Rutanga, umupira urenzwa na mugenzi we.

19:37

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi wo hagati, Sassi Ali ukomoka muri Tanzania, atangije umukino ubanjirijwe no gufata umunota umwe wo kwibuka abanyamakuru ba Azam TV baguye mu mpanuka y'imodoka yabaye ejo muri Tanzania.


18:04

Amakipe yombi yishyushya

18:04

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku ruhande rwa Atlabara FC

Umutoza wa Atlabara FC, Morris Michael yitabaje:

Khamis Daniel
Mutawakil Abdelkarim
Mustafa Salim
Yakub Adam
Buay Lam
Peter Sunday
Mandela Malish
Okena Pixy
Nelson Mandela
Jimmy Michel
Obeyono Philip Edisiri

18:00

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

Umutoza wa Rayon Sports, Mathurin Ovambe Olivier ukomoka muri Cameroun yagaruye ikipe yabanjemo ku mukino wa TP Mazembe.

Kimenyi Yves
Iragire Saidi
Rugwiro Herve
Iradukunda Eric Radu,
Rutanga Eric (c)
Nshimiyimana Amran
Mugheni Kakule Fabrice
Comodore Olokwei
Ciza Hussein
Iranzi Jean Claude
Ulimwengu Jules

17:57

Indi mikino yabereye i Huye

Uretse itsinda A, no mu itsinda B ry'i Huye bakinnye, aho Mukura Victory Sports yanganyije na Bandari FC ibitego 2-2 mu mukino watangiye saa 13:00.

kCCA yo muri Uganda yatsinze igitego 1-0 Azam FC yo muri Tanzania inafite igikombe giheruka.

17:55

Umukino wabimburiwe n'uwa TP Mazembe na KMC

Guhera saa 17:00 hano kuri Stade ya Kigali habaye undi mukino wo mu itsinda A, hagati ya TP Mazembe yo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na KCM yo muri Tanzania.

Uyu mukino wabanjirijwe no gufata umunota umwe wo kwibuka abanyamakuru batanu ba Azam TV baguye mu mpanuka y'imodoka ejo hashize muri Tanzania, warangiye Mazembe itsinze igitego 1-0.

Azam TV ni umufatanyabikorwa w'iri rushanwa riterwa inkunga na Perezida Kagame ndetse ni yo yerekana imikino y'iri rushanwa ribera mu Mijyi itatu y'u Rwanda; Rubavu, Huye na Kigali.

17:52

Si ubwa mbere Atlabara FC ikinira mu Rwanda

Iyi kipe yo muri Sudani y'Epfo yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu 2016, aho yahuye na Police FC mu ijonjora ribanza rya CAF Confederation Cup.

Police FC yatsinze umukino ubanza wabereye i Kigali ku bitego 3-1 mu gihe uwo kwishyura watsinzwe na Atlabara FC ibitego 2-1, ikipe y'abashinzwe umutekano w'abanyarwanda ikomeza mu cyiciro gikurikira ku bitego 4-3.

17:49

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo. Hagiye kubera umukino w'umunsi wa kabiri mu itsinda A rya CECAFA Kagame Cup 2019 hagati ya Rayon Sports na Atlabara FC yo muri Sudani y'Epfo.

Rayon Sports yitwaye neza mu mukino wa mbere wabaye ku Cyumweru, itsinda TP Mazembe igitego 1-0 cya Ulimwengu Jules mu gihe Atlabara FC yo yanganyije na KMC yo muri Tanzanie igitego 1-1.

Umukino nyir'izina uratangira mukanya saa 19:30.
